vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.23;
father of: Maaseiah (H4641P)
§ Ananiah = "Jehovah clouds"
n pr m
1) ancestor of Azariah who assisted in rebuilding the city wall in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
2) a city northwest of Jerusalem to which some Benjamite exiles returned
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ancestro de Azarías, sacerdote, post exílico; (b)   lugar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞難尼、亞難雅 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華籠罩"
陽性專有名詞
1)尼希米時期重建耶路撒冷城牆者的祖先 #尼 3:23|
專有名詞地名
2) 一個位於耶路撒冷北方的城鎮，便雅憫人被擄歸回所居住之地 #尼 11:32|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚难尼、亚难雅 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华笼罩"
阳性专有名词
1)尼希米时期重建耶路撒冷城墙者的祖先 #尼 3:23|
专有名词地名
2) 一个位于耶路撒冷北方的城镇，便雅悯人被掳归回所居住之地 #尼 11:32|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Ananiah = "Jehovah clouds"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) ancestor of Azariah who assisted in rebuilding the city wall in the time of Nehemiah
n pr loc
2) a city northwest of Jerusalem to which some Benjamite exiles returned
